headline: squall warning in effect
description:
Squalls with wind gusts up to 60 knots, frequent lightning and poor to very poor visibility in thunderstorms heavy at times are expected or occurring in the area.

A line of very strong thunderstorms currently located from Antler Lake to Kashabowie,  is tracking east at 55 knots and should reach Lake Nipigon in the next hour.

###

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. For more information monitor Canadian Coast Guard radio or Weatheradio stations.
instruction: Consider delaying or postponing travel in areas under the squall warning.
